column5: Very cool video thanks for sharing!  I have lost every single Whitefish I have hooked through the ice so far (3 in total).  I am no longer using spreaders when fishing for them hehe  That's a great perch the little one caught too...look on the face is priceless!  Tony
That was a great video, thanks for posting! I agree, the smile on the little one made my day! HH
Cool video, thanks. I love the Chili Peppers too  Joey
Yea man, that kid is awesome, love the enthusiasm!
That's a great way to do up a report!!!  Congrats on the whitie......and that kid was having a blast!!!  Right on!!  Sinker
Good work Rob! The kid is very cute....must get that from his Mother.
Kid having a ball! Just what childhood should be all about!!
Great video the smile on the kid is what's it's all about  rob
Excellent, excellent report. That child is so happy. Good on ya!
That is great.  My nine-year old son and I really enjoyed it!
that was a great video,,cant wait to go fishing with my boy hes 2 1/2 now..
